    • loginUser

      public boolean loginUser(String username, String password)
      This method will call Staff DB Controller to login
      Parameters:
      username - username input
      password - password input
      Returns:
      True if login successful, else False if login unsuccessful

    • displaySignup

      public void displaySignup()
      This method displays the Signup UI for the staff to input Username and Password for the new staff

    • createNewStaff

      Parameters:

    • getIsLoggedIn

      public boolean getIsLoggedIn()
      This method calls the SystemSettingDatabaseController to login the currentUser object
      Returns:
      True if login is successful or False if login is unsuccessful

      public void logout()
